credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19 x 24 cm (7 1/2 x 9 7/16 in.)
title: Sample
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: plain weave
description: Two rows of single warps alternate with three rows of paired warps in bright colors. Lower sample is accented with metallic yarn. Warp is two-ply cotton in two shades of orange. Weft is yellow chenille, smooth yellow plied yarn and bright pink plied yarn. Lower section has flat and wrapped metal yarns paired with plied yarns.
